review: Absolutely love it.  My 3rd one.  One for me, hasband and grandkids

review: Sling TV does not work. Blank screen.
author: woohooo

review: I am really enjoying the fire stick, there is something for everyone to enjoy!
author: Pacia Smith

review: Great. Hookup was easy. Didn tv fit my toshiba in side hdmi because of the shape but i just moved something from back of tv hdmi and works great
author: Amazon Customer "JEAN C FINNEGAN"

review: Easy to install. Would like to see larger selection of movies and TV shows.
author: Pawson,J

review: Due to software updates, I found that my blu ray would no longer be able to stream youtube so I purchased the Fire Stick as a replacement. I discovered the stick works even better than the blu ray ever did at searching by offering suggestions and had more available videos. I wish I had gotten it sooner. I also enjoy using it with my Amazon prime membership and mirroring my kindle fire where I stream movies from TCM. It takes a bit of effort to mirror the kindle fire, at least for me but it is worth it.
author: graphics guru

review: Amazing but then again maybe I shouldn't have gotten it because now my social life is in shambles when all I wanna do is binge watch EVERYTHING just now on a bigger screen. Smh. But ya it's great and you should get one too so we're in the same boat.
author: Breanna Wyant

review: Great for viewing Amazon Prime, but I cannot figure out how to cast my netflix subscription using this device.
author: Esther Walker
